messages.content: Ikea is known for its commitment to sustainability and environmental responsibility, and the company has made efforts to improve its labor practices and employee welfare. However, there have also been concerns raised about working conditions and employee treatment at Ikea facilities. It's important to note that Ikea has a diverse supply chain and production process, with different suppliers and manufacturers around the world, so the working conditions at each facility may vary.
How physically demanding is Machine operator in Ikea production

The physical demands of a machine operator position in Ikea production can vary depending on the specific type of machinery being operated and the manufacturing process being used. Some machine operators may be required to stand for extended periods of time, lift heavy objects, and work in a noisy environment. Other tasks may include operating machinery, assembling and disassembling components, and performing quality control checks. The physical demands of the job can be demanding and may require a certain level of physical fitness and strength.
Does this apply even to computer operated machines ?

The physical demands of a machine operator position in Ikea production, regardless of whether the machinery is computer operated or not, can be significant. Machine operators are often required to stand for extended periods of time, lift heavy objects, and work in a noisy environment. Other tasks may include operating machinery, assembling and disassembling components, and performing quality control checks. The physical demands of the job can be demanding and may require a certain level of physical fitness and strength. The specific requirements of the job may vary depending on the type of machinery being operated and the manufacturing process being used.
